title: Topple
content:
Backbreaker Weapon Actions 1~4 Damage 1d4+4Bludgeoning Swipe at a creature to knock it Prone. 1 turn Melee DEX Save Attack Roll Short Rest Action

1d4+4Bludgeoning

Swipe at a creature to knock it Prone.

Melee DEX Save Attack Roll Short Rest

Topple is an Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.

Topple Information

Swipe at a creature to knock it Prone. 1d4Bludgeoning Type: Action 1 turn Melee DEX Save Attack Roll Short Rest Range: 1.5 m

How to unlock Topple

Can be unlocked by: Mourning Frost

Topple Tips & Notes

Excellent for characters that don't want to be in melee since a prone enemy can't use reactions when you try to run away
